definition: to put a new bus or railway station into operation

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: We are giving of 25% of your investment as bonus on the first two days.
sentences.chinese: 此站送投資額的25%，好象是在開站的最初一兩天。
